data.title: Fujitsu-JAIMS Foundation
data.meta_description: Organization Overview - Founded in 1972, Fujitsu-JAIMS offers a program that helps to develop the “innovation leaders” who will create new forms of value and deliver solutions to social issues, and provides a community that facilitates interactions and exchanges between innovation leaders.
data.text:
Establishment July 2012 (JAIMS, a nonprofit educational institution in Hawaii, was established in 1972. The headquarters function of JAIMS was transferred to Fujitsu-JAIMS Foundation in April 2013.) Director, Board of Directors DAVIS, Scott T.

Professor, College of Business Department of Global Business, Rikkyo University

Yumiko Kajiwara

Corporate Executive Officer, EVP, CSuO(Chief Sustainability Officer), Fujitsu Ltd.

Mami Ohtani

General Manager, Fujitsu-JAIMS Foundation Alumni Totals Graduates

Graduates JAIMS and Fujitsu-JAIMS programs: 3,383

totaling 23,774 participants from 55 countries and regions
